casebody.data:
GIBBS
v.
DAISY. No. 380P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for William Daisy.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of July 2005 by Petitioner "Appeal from the Order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals" Case # COAP03-523 of June 22, 2005:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
